title: Platinum Edgewater 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Great Layout
posting_body: ['This property features floor to ceiling windows with WATER VIEWS from every room!', 'Great split plan with high ceilings featuring a spacious living room with a nest thermostat, king size bedrooms, walk in closets, black out shades, sun shades and en-suite bathrooms.', "This condo also feature's granite countertops, stainless steel kitchen appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and a private balcony with glass railings.", 'The residents enjoy a number of wonderful amenities, including a fitness center, party room, conference room, sauna, steam room, swimming pool, and Jacuzzi.', 'Additionally, Platinum Condominium offers 24-hour security, covered parking, and concierge service.', 'walking distance to all.', 'Contact us today for a viewing', '1,007 sq ft. Unit', '1 Parking Space', 'Wifi/Cable Included', 'Asking Rent : $4,200/month', 'You can either Text or Call :', 'Emmanuel CLODIC', 'show contact info', 'English/French/Spanish', 'London Foster Realty', '**NO REALTOR/BROKER CALLS**', '1060,1050, ICON, JADE, THE SAIL, VUE, THE CLUB, THE MARK, BRICKELL KEY, ONE MIAMI, ONE BROADWAY, BRICKELL FIRST, LATITUDE, NEO VERTIKA, AXIS, 500, BRICKELL ON THE RIVER, MINT.', 'IVY.', 'WIND.', 'CENTRE 1010.THE EMERALD, SKYLINE, INFINITY, THE PLAZA, SOLARIS, THE LOFT DOWNTOWN, 4 MIDTOWN, MIDRISE, MIDTOWN 2, EPIC, VIZCAYNE, EVERGLADES ON THE BAY, 50 BISCAYNE, MARINA BLUE, 900 BISCAYNE, 888, TEN MUSEUM, BISCAYNE BLVD, MIDTOWN, DOWNTOWN, BRICKELL, MIAMI, 33130, 33131, 33132, 33129.MARQUIS.', 'TEN PARK.', 'CITY CENTRE.', 'BOND.', 'SLS.', 'LUX.', 'HEIGHTS.']
